resources.string: Are you sure that you want to reset this game and start from scratch?

To play, take turns placing a letter from the tile rack. Tiles must be placed adjacent to an already placed tile. As they are placed, new letters are added to the tile rack based on letter frequency. 
 
 To win, you must form a valid 4-letter word (dictionary: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/getify/dwordly-game/main/four-letter-words.json). 
 
Click on an empty cell to place a tile, click on it again to remove the tile, and click "Play Turn" to submit a turn. Have fun!!!
